EmailTemplate.name: EM-2017-04-25-SEC-BoydC.EM-2017-04-25-Boyd #1
EmailTemplate.subject: Can I Send You to the Memphis BBQ World Championship?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
I hope this note finds you well! As you may have seen, Turbonomic is offering two VIP passes to the 2017 World Championship Barbeque Cooking Contest in Memphis (valued at $1,190.00). All it takes to be entered to win is filling out a brief survey and scheduling a quick 30-minute meeting with a Turbonomic engineer!
One Grand Prize winner <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/YQMY9QG?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=[marketo_zs00ja7e8g_value]&marketo_6ailg567og=[marketo_6ailg567og_value]&marketo_27kfq4j6cg=[marketo_27kfq4j6cg_value]]]> will receive two VIP passes, including parking, to the event taking place May 17-20!
Simply fill out this brief survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/YQMY9QG?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=[marketo_zs00ja7e8g_value]&marketo_6ailg567og=[marketo_6ailg567og_value]&marketo_27kfq4j6cg=[marketo_27kfq4j6cg_value]]]> and we will be in contact shortly. Looking forward to speaking with you!
Best, Chris
Chris Boyd Account Executive - TN Office 857-305-4657 | Cell 901-502-1650
VMTurbo is now Turbonomic <[[http://turbonomic.com/turbonomic/]]>
